title: NexusBet

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: NexusBet on October 25, 2023, 07:07:45 PMLEADER IN THE FIELD OF IGAMING SOFTWARE.We will launch an online casino in 24 hours!Create your new successful business and launch an online casino with 10,000+ games.Website: https://nexusbet.ru/So you are an Igaming software creator and you have one casino launching, I recommend that you get yourself a Copper account in preparation for the launching of your casino so you can display images in your thread and post you can also hire a thread designer by looking one on the Service section things will be easier for you once you announce your casino here if you follow my advice.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Welcome to the forum!!! Robelneo has suggested correctly on getting a copper membership. You want to present your casino in a professional manner. I am available if you decide to do any marketing as well, you can reach me @yahoo62278 on telegram or through private message here. Good luck with the site.

comments.body: Welcome to the forum!Can’t wait to see the highlights of this casino and the edge over its competitor.I’m really curious about the iGaming software company creates their own casinos, is all the game on this site created by the whole team or you’ll also introduce other games from other developer?

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Welcome to the forum.By the way, was not Nexus the name of a company which used to offer services of staking and financial instruments to people who wished to stack their Bitcoin and Stablecoins with them? It was kind of a competition to Celsius, and if I recall correctly, I think both of them collapsed in the end? If it was the case, then it is kind unfortunate your platform decided to go with a name completely similar to one which did not have anything to do with gambling. Anyways, let us see what you got to offer to our community of gamblers. Good luck.

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: upon checking the site, the language is russian by default. now, i was looking for the tab where you can select the language but to no avail or maybe i coudn't figure it out.   they should put a clickable tab where you can easily see what language you want to use though. anyway, let us see how this new casino will evolve thru time. good luck!

comments.author: Text
comments.created_time: October 26, 2023, 01:56:32 AMLast edit: October 26, 2023, 02:10:54 AM by Text
comments.body: Quote from: AmoreJaz on October 25, 2023, 11:46:22 PMupon checking the site, the language is russian by default. now, i was looking for the tab where you can select the language but to no avail or maybe i coudn't figure it out.   they should put a clickable tab where you can easily see what language you want to use though. anyway, let us see how this new casino will evolve thru time. good luck!Yeah, you're right. I also tried several ways to translate their website language but with no success, even the browser's built-in translator (right-click then "Translate to English") is not working with Chrome, Brave, and Edge, and can't detect the language. I already tried to paste their website URL on Google Translate but still it is not being translated.I think this is the first time I encountered a website that it is not being translated using the simple browser's built-in translator.

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: First off, welcome to the community.Second, as others have suggested, you might want to get a copper membership so that you can post an image. In any case, there's a lot of members here that can make you a beautiful and attracted ANN thread.Third, competition in this niche is very tough, so I guess you need to market it like a signature campaign so that you can reach a lot of audience.Best of luck and hopefully we can hear from you soon. And if I'm not mistaken, this is the first time that we have heard a Igaming software company having their own online platform so this is huge for the gaming industry.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Everyone has welcomed you so I guess that you have seen how welcoming this community and have already suggested you what you must have for you to make this thread more appealing to visitors.Like the feedback of amorejaz. Judging on your domain extension, it is based on Russia and that means that obviously the language is on Russian. Much better if you will have the English language as default for visitors that are not from Russia or its close region.Or you make it visible that someone can change the language that they like as an option.

comments.body: The name and the logo look familiar to me. They remind me of the Nexo exchange/wallet because they are very similar logo and domain name. Are you guys related to Nexo.com? Or the idea of the design just came from https://nexo.com/ ? Anyway welcome to BitcoinTalk.

comments.body: Quote from: Johnyz on October 25, 2023, 09:35:11 PMWelcome to the forum!Can’t wait to see the highlights of this casino and the edge over its competitor.I’m really curious about the iGaming software company creates their own casinos, is all the game on this site created by the whole team or you’ll also introduce other games from other developer? comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: xLays on October 26, 2023, 05:06:29 AMThe name and the logo look familiar to me. They remind me of the Nexo exchange/wallet because they are very similar logo and domain name. Are you guys related to Nexo.com? Or the idea of the design just came from https://nexo.com/ ? Anyway welcome to BitcoinTalk. I had exactly the same thought in my mind, but i do not think they are related (though op will still have to answer), i think they just got the idea of the name and logo from Nexo just as you have said.Anyways, i visited the site, it does look really great, probably because dark backgrounds have always looked very good on gambling casinos, the site is pretty fast as well, but the only downside for me is that, it's not written in English, looks like its Russia or some sort, but i do believe that as the site gets launched to global users, it will be converted to English for the sake of foreign users, except if op tend to make the site a local casino.Anyways again, welcome to the forum, looking forward to the official opening of the site.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: NexusBet on October 25, 2023, 07:07:45 PMWebsite: https://nexusbet.ru/It’s rare for me to play on a casino with a domain using a country like “.ru”. Are you sure that your casino will mot be limited to Russian citizen since the country have a sanction on multiple country which you might find restrictive when you accept players from country that sanction it.The default language is in Russian which I’m not where is the translation button for your casino. I really suggest to have a mirror link for global players so that it can be easily play or browse on your games that is on default RU players.

comments.author: Ojima-ojo
comments.body: Nice to see another new casino coming out with a familiar domain name like this and even yesterday another new casino was also introduced on this board and the name also looks and sounds like another existing company and I am sure if they are related to those companies then the ops will in no time clarify that for us here but until then we can only welcome them with open hands.But the advice is for the ops to first of all be filled with enough information and content that make it easier for us to know a lot of things about the casino before we even visit the site, and also prepare to get a copper member for that purpose.

I really suggest to have a mirror link for global players so that it can be easily play or browse on your games that is on default RU players.If he wants players from other countries he should create a mirror site specifically for global players, there's so many questions that OP needs to address, we will see if he will take our advice and follow these pieces of advice.

comments.author: NexusBet
comments.body: Good afternoon, we provide a platform to launch our own online casino for our clients.Our company is based in Russia, but client projects have already been launched in a number of European countries.A set of games is provided both personally from us and from third-party providers.
